  labels = {["static"]}>
Create an instruction stream that represents a single iteration and stage of each instruction.

This function differs from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aff7649124c08f77b72e5d539f2f8afdf">SMSchedule::finalizeSchedule</a> in that this doesn&#39;t have any side-effect to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a>. That is, this function is an approximation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aff7649124c08f77b72e5d539f2f8afdf">SMSchedule::finalizeSchedule</a> with all non-const operations removed.

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- MachinePipeliner.cpp - Machine Software Pipeliner Pass -------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An implementation of the Swing Modulo Scheduling (SMS) software pipeliner.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This SMS implementation is a target-independent back-end pass. When enabled,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the pass runs just prior to the register allocation pass, while the machine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IR is in SSA form. If software pipelining is successful, then the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop is replaced by the optimized loop. The optimized loop contains one or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more prolog blocks, the pipelined kernel, and one or more epilog blocks. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the instructions cannot be scheduled in a given MII, we increase the MII by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one and try again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SMS implementation is an extension of the ScheduleDAGInstrs class. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// represent loop carried dependences in the DAG as order edges to the Phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes. We also perform several passes over the DAG to eliminate unnecessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edges that inhibit the ability to pipeline. The implementation uses the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DFAPacketizer class to compute the minimum initiation interval and the check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where an instruction may be inserted in the pipelined schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In order for the SMS pass to work, several target specific hooks need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implemented to get information about the loop structure and to rewrite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachinePipeliner.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The SMS algorithm consists of the following main steps:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 Computation and analysis of the dependence graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 Ordering of the nodes (instructions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 Attempt to Schedule the loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create an instruction stream that represents a single iteration and stage of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// each instruction. This function differs from SMSchedule::finalizeSchedule in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that this doesn&#39;t have any side-effect to SwingSchedulerDAG. That is, this</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// non-const operations removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081" lineLink="#a4923617d2f897074725d389de4f450de"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4923617d2f897074725d389de4f450de">computeScheduledInsts</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;SSD,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the number of functional unit alternatives needed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at each stage, and take the minimum value. We prioritize the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should have non-empty InstrItins or hasInstrSchedModel!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the critical resources needed by the instruction. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function records the functional units needed by instructions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must use only one functional unit. We use this as a tie breaker</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for computing the resource MII. The instrutions that require</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are two patterns of last-use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - by an instruction of the current iteration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - by a phi instruction of the next iteration (loop carried value)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Furthermore, following two groups of instructions are executed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simultaneously</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - next iteration&#39;s phi instructions in i-th stage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - current iteration&#39;s instructions in i+1-th stage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function calculates the last-use of each register while taking into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// account the above two patterns.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Calculate the resource constrained minimum initiation interval for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// specified loop. We use the DFA to model the resources needed for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// each instruction, and we ignore dependences. A different DFA is created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for each cycle that is required. When adding a new instruction, we attempt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to add it to each existing DFA, until a legal space is found. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction cannot be reserved in an existing DFA, we create a new one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SwingSchedulerDAG::calculateResMII() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Calculate the recurrence-constrainted minimum initiation interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Iterate over each circuit.  Compute the delay(c) and distance(c)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for each circuit. The II needs to satisfy the inequality</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// delay(c) - II&#42;distance(c) &lt;= 0 For each circuit, choose the smallest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// II that satisfies the inequality, and the RecMII is the maximum</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of those values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SwingSchedulerDAG::calculateRecMII(NodeSetType &amp;NodeSets) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RecMII = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NodeSet &amp;Nodes : NodeSets) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Nodes.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Delay = Nodes.getLatency();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Distance = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ii = ceil(delay / distance)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurMII = (Delay + Distance - 1) / Distance;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes.setRecMII(CurMII);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurMII &gt; RecMII)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RecMII = CurMII;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RecMII;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create the adjacency structure of the nodes in the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SwingSchedulerDAG::Circuits::createAdjacencyStructure(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;int, int&gt; OutputDeps;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain. This records any chains and adds them later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OE.isOutputDep()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OE.getDst()-&gt;isBoundaryNode() || OE.isArtificial())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This code is retained o preserve previous behavior and prevent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regression. This condition means that anti-dependnecies within an</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to consider this dependence as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Remove this code if it doesn&#39;t have significant impact on</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create artificial dependencies between the source of COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is loop-carried to the USE in next iteration. This will help pipeliner avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// additional copies that are needed across iterations. An artificial dependence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edge is added from USE to SOURCE of COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHI-------Anti-Dep-----&gt; COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE (loop-carried)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SRCOfCopY------True-Dep---&gt; COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHI-------True-Dep------&gt; USEOfPhi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The mutation creates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// USEOfPHI -------Artificial-Dep---&gt; SRCOfCopy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This overall will ensure, the USEOfPHI is scheduled before SRCOfCopy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (since USE is a predecessor), implies, the COPY/ REG&#95;SEQUENCE is scheduled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// late  to avoid additional copies across iterations. The possible scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order would be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// USEOfPHI --- SRCOfCopy---  COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SwingSchedulerDAG::CopyToPhiMutation::apply(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs/#a5bcb745a3e78c329d1431608b1f51c25">ScheduleDAGInstrs</a> &#42;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SUnit &amp;SU : DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SU.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1912d4fbc40c61a12b1f770ad54dfd74">isCopy</a>() &amp;&amp; !SU.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a8d97d09150ddcbcf5039f938111358ee">isRegSequence</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Record the loop carried PHIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SmallVector&lt;SUnit &#42;, 4&gt; PHISUs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Record the SrcSUs that feed the COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SmallVector&lt;SUnit &#42;, 4&gt; SrcSUs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Dep : SU.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#ae2b43854b542de66eec6475adc48f56c">Preds</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SUnit &#42;TmpSU = Dep.getSUnit();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MachineInstr &#42;TmpMI = TmpSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732">SDep::Kind</a> DepKind = Dep.getKind();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Save the loop carried PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DepKind == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732abe9561936346ab5c5e22fe544994b06e">SDep::Anti</a> &amp;&amp; TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PHISUs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(TmpSU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Save the source of COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the source has no pre-decessors, we will end up creating cycles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DepKind == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732af91df2221290eaa1a368403ffad49a26">SDep::Data</a> &amp;&amp; !TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>() &amp;&amp; TmpSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a25329a072c76c185b8c5ff530c632762">NumPreds</a> &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SrcSUs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(TmpSU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PHISUs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 0 || SrcSUs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the USEs of PHI. If the use is a PHI or REG&#95;SEQUENCE, push back this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SUnit to the container.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;SUnit &#42;, 8&gt;</a> UseSUs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not use iterator based loop here as we are updating the container.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> &lt; PHISUs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(); ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Dep : PHISUs&#91;Index&#93;-&gt;Succs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dep.getKind() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732af91df2221290eaa1a368403ffad49a26">SDep::Data</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check if the existing node-sets are profitable. If not, then ignore the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// recurrent node-sets, and attempt to schedule all nodes together. This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a heuristic. If the MII is large and all the recurrent node-sets are small,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then it&#39;s best to try to schedule all instructions together instead of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// starting with the recurrent node-sets.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When scheduling a Phi it is better to start at the late cycle and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also, do backward search when all scheduled predecessors are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Pass.ORE-&gt;emit(&#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Try to schedule the node at the specified StartCycle and continue</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864" lineLink="#af6df1639af84a974f3bdcd4b93c32c2f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="#af6df1639af84a974f3bdcd4b93c32c2f">multipleIterations</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute the scheduling start slot for the instruction.  The start slot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2874"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// depends on any predecessor or successor nodes scheduled already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2875" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#acfd4efd1c9f1a0174bd6f3942238c51b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#acfd4efd1c9f1a0174bd6f3942238c51b">SMSchedule::computeStart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MaxEarlyStart, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MinLateStart,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2876"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg">SwingSchedulerDDG</a> &#42;DDG = DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a461d411e76e02e7a4ec0ca56098540aa">getDDG</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate over each instruction that has been scheduled already.  The start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// slot computation depends on whether the previously scheduled instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is a predecessor or successor of the specified instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> cycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aa9cf7f8bcf9a31775f99c732ad69e907">getFirstCycle</a>(); cycle &lt;= LastCycle; ++cycle) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a9d33c5d7d0efea61cb68e2ce82f693ce">getInstructions</a>(cycle)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;IE : DDG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg/#ac155300b317b84aef98c8f6b5381c193">getInEdges</a>(SU)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IE.getSrc() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Add reverse edge to &#96;DDG&#96; instead of calling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;isLoopCarriedDep&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a78e274f7aa81fdeddac470d645c3c6e8">isLoopCarriedDep</a>(IE)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a326b69bb87197af5c7e9398da090d754">earliestCycleInChain</a>(IE, DDG) + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2890"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#42;MinLateStart = std::min(&#42;MinLateStart, End);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2891"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2892"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EarlyStart = cycle + IE.getLatency() - IE.getDistance() &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2893"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#42;MaxEarlyStart = std::max(&#42;MaxEarlyStart, EarlyStart);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2894"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2896"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2897"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;OE : DDG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg/#afbd6cd25113b672fb9e9ec1339355d82">getOutEdges</a>(SU)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OE.getDst() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Add reverse edge to &#96;DDG&#96; instead of calling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;isLoopCarriedDep&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a78e274f7aa81fdeddac470d645c3c6e8">isLoopCarriedDep</a>(OE)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Start = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ae7d28b348c77e17419b65d3f3d7d55a4">latestCycleInChain</a>(OE, DDG) + 1 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3007"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MoveUse = Pos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3008"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3009"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3010"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;IE : DDG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg/#ac155300b317b84aef98c8f6b5381c193">getInEdges</a>(SU)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3011"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IE.getSrc() != &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3012"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3013"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((IE.isAntiDep() || IE.isOutputDep() || IE.isOrderDep()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3014"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a64379c9a0436bfd06da2e854c7fc9c33">stageScheduled</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) == StageInst1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3015"><span class="doxyHighlight">        OrderAfterDef = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3016"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MoveDef = Pos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3017"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3018"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3019"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3020"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3021"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A circular dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3022"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OrderAfterDef &amp;&amp; OrderBeforeUse &amp;&amp; MoveUse == MoveDef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3023"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OrderBeforeUse = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3024"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3025"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OrderAfterDef takes precedences over OrderBeforeDef. The latter is due</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a loop-carried dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OrderBeforeDef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3028"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OrderBeforeUse = !OrderAfterDef || (MoveUse &gt; MoveDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3029"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The uncommon case when the instruction order needs to be updated because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is both a use and def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OrderBeforeUse &amp;&amp; OrderAfterDef) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3033"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;UseSU = Insts.at(MoveUse);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3034"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;DefSU = Insts.at(MoveDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3035"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MoveUse &gt; MoveDef) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3036"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveUse);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3037"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3038"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3039"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3040"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveUse);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3041"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a70c8219e8d9627e2373f281be45f96ae">orderDependence</a>(SSD, UseSU, Insts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3043"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a70c8219e8d9627e2373f281be45f96ae">orderDependence</a>(SSD, SU, Insts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3044"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a70c8219e8d9627e2373f281be45f96ae">orderDependence</a>(SSD, DefSU, Insts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3045"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3046"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3047"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Put the new instruction first if there is a use in the list. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3048"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// put it at the end of the list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3049"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OrderBeforeUse)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the generated schedule is valid. This function checks if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an instruction that uses a physical register is scheduled in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different stage than the definition. The pipeliner does not handle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// physical register values that may cross a basic block boundary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Furthermore, if a physical def/use pair is assigned to the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cycle, orderDependence does not guarantee def/use ordering, so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case should be considered invalid.  (The test checks for both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// earlier and same-cycle use to be more robust.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3195" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a7c7d5ab8d9814b721a1844a867ef948a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a7c7d5ab8d9814b721a1844a867ef948a">SMSchedule::isValidSchedule</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;SSD) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3214"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A property of the node order in swing-modulo-scheduling is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that for nodes outside circuits the following holds:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// none of them is scheduled after both a successor and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The method below checks whether the property is met.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If not, debug information is printed and statistics information updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that we do not use an assert statement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The reason is that although an invalid node order may prevent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the pipeliner from finding a pipelined schedule for arbitrary II,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it does not lead to the generation of incorrect code.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3310"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Attempt to fix the degenerate cases when the instruction serialization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// causes the register lifetimes to overlap. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   p&#39; = store&#95;pi(p, b)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      = load p, offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In this case p and p&#39; overlap, which means that two registers are needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instead, this function changes the load to use p&#39; and updates the offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3318" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a51bda1806219d879123625c8d4ae3fbc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a51bda1806219d879123625c8d4ae3fbc">SwingSchedulerDAG::fixupRegisterOverlaps</a>(std::deque&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt; &amp;Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OverlapReg = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewBaseReg = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU : Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getNumOperands(); i &lt; e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3324"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3325"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for an instruction that uses p. The instruction occurs in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3326"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same cycle but occurs later in the serialized order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a69544ec8658eadeed98245dc37c3a541">isUse</a>() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() == OverlapReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3328"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the instruction appears in the InstrChanges structure,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3329"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which contains instructions that can have the offset updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3330"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SUnit &#42;, std::pair&lt;unsigned, int64&#95;t&gt;</a>&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">::iterator</a> It =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3331"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InstrChanges.find(SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3332"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It != InstrChanges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3333"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BasePos, OffsetPos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3334"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the base register and adjust the offset.</span></CodeLine>
